name: Yardmaster Lite - The Train Game
description:
"Yardmaster does for trains what Flight Control did for planes and Harbor Master did for boats."

"All aboard! Great game! Super addictive. The kids mode is brilliant!"

"Excellent game play... Love it!"

"It is obvious that this game was made by train enthusiasts, the look and feel of everything surrounding the game is fantastic..."

Yardmaster puts you behind the control box of a busy train yard. Keep your wits about you and wrap your head around the serpentine track changes or face a train wreck!

New YouTube video:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EJqPTg0a13o
(Or search for "Yardmaster iPhone")

***** LITE VERSION *****

Try one map and one difficulty mode in this free version. Upgrade to the full version while it's still available at an introductory price, and get:

- two more maps

- four more difficulty levels
(including "infinite play" kids mode)

- online high scores from Geocade

- share your scores with your friends on Facebook

- free upgrades

************************

Using the simplest of controls, your job is to direct the train engines back to their sheds. It's easy to learn, but hard to become a master. Match the train color to the shed color or else the mayhem and madness will begin!

You won't be able to resist the highly addictive gameplay, as well as trying to beat your high score! Quality entertainment for train lovers of all ages.

Listen to your own music, with or without the delightful in-game sounds. Resume an interrupted game any time you're ready to take control again.

Yardmaster has high quality graphics and all the bells and whistles you could ask for. Don't delay, hop aboard the latest iPhone sensation right now - destination: fun!

How to play:

Tap the railroad crossings to allow the trains to change tracks. Tap a train to pull the emergency brake, but watch out: those drivers get impatient!

As you prove your abilities, you will naturally be rewarded with more complex work. Be sure to avoid collisions, or you will be fired! If you need a coffee break, tap the pause button. Want to stoke that boiler? Tap the ffwd button.

Looking for more fun? Try iXylophone, the play along xylophone for kids of all ages!

**********

Just in time for the holidays, the creators of iXylophone bring you iXylophone Christmas!

This brand new music app features a bright, colorful xylophone and lots of animated toys for you and your whole family to enjoy.

Watch as snowflakes fall, angels appear, and bells ring while you listen to the carols playing.

With standard playback controls like repeat and shuffle, and the ability to continue playing even with the screen turned off, iXylophone Christmas gives you a complete holiday music playlist for the price of one song!

Santa Claus is coming to town, so have yourself a merry iXylophone Christmas!
